text: Mikhail Yuryevich Sidorov (born Moscow, 19 November 1986) is a Russian rugby union player who plays as a flanker. He played for Slava Moscow. He went on a loan to Yenisey-STM Krasnoyarsk in October 2015, so he could play at the European Rugby Challenge Cup. He had 6 caps for Russia, from 2011 to 2016, scoring 1 try, 5 points on aggregate. He was called for the 2011 Rugby World Cup, playing in two games without scoring.Mikhail Sidorov International Statistics ==References== ==External links== *Mikhail Sidorov International Statistics Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Russian rugby union players Category:Russia international rugby union players Category:Slava Moscow players Category:Yenisey-STM Krasnoyarsk players Category:Rugby union flankers Category:Sportspeople from Moscow
title: Mikhail Sidorov (rugby union)
